Got an

idea

? We got you covered.

We are a co-development studio of passionate programmers and game developers dedicated to helping you create immersive and engaging experiences for players around the world.

Get In TouchView Portfolio

Gameplay

We'll work with you to prototype, implement and test gameplay mechanics and features. Together we can create engaging and dynamic gameplay that will captivate players of all kinds.

Graphics

We offer graphics programming services for the video game industry. Our team of expert programmers are well-versed in the use of shaders, lighting, and materials to create advanced visual effects and ensure optimal performance on various platforms

Backend & Networking

Looking to bring a multiplayer mode to your game? We can do the legwork for you. We also architect backend solutions for games that require more advanced lobby systems, and even MMO's.

Engine

Our company has experience designing, implementing, and maintaining the underlying game engine that powers a game. This can include creating custom game engines from scratch, or modifying and extending existing engines to create the technical foundation for game developers to bring their ideas to life.

Optimization & Bugfixing

Our team will identify and fix bottlenecks, bugs and glitches that can impact player experience. From memory management to code refactoring, we will make sure your game runs smoothly and efficiently, providing the players with a polished and enjoyable experience on any platform.

Porting

Looking to hire someone to port your game to a new platform? We can handle both the technical side and rework the control scheme.

Start your online adventure here!

Get In Touch

Expand your

online presence

.

Designing and developing digital experiences is our specialty, but our story doesn't end there.

We deliver a customized corporate identity including logos, fonts, business cards and more. The total package is just as important to us as the details.

Our

Values

Customer focus

As a customer you will be involved as closely as possible in the implementation of your project. This way you can always make adjustments where necessary and an excellent result is assured.

Flexibility

Our small and permanent team ensures efficient communication. This way we can always respond to your needs.

Expertise

Our talented team of developers does not shy away from a challenge. Do you have a complex problem? Our expertise will help you on your way.

Support

After the completion of your project, we remain available for further support. We also offer tools with which you can adjust the content of your website yourself.

Got an idea that you're eager to try out? Get in touch with us!
